job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using human feedback to train AI models by crafting questions and evaluating code. While it mentions 'generative AI models' and 'large language models', it does not involve the core engineering tasks of building, fine-tuning, or deploying these models. The role is more about providing data and feedback for training rather than engineering the AI systems themselves. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it primarily focuses on the use of AI tools for training and lacks the technical depth of an ML or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'help train AI models' and 'train generative artificial intelligence models' by crafting questions and evaluating code, which directly relates to the process of creating or adapting AI models.
The phrase 'Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models' directly pertains to the process of assessing and refining AI model outputs, which is a part of the modeling lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

job_tasks.justification: The description asks for 'experienced software engineer' and 'talented coders' to 'lend your coding expertise', indicating a need for software development skills.
The phrase 'lend your coding expertise to train AI models' implies the application of software development skills in the context of AI training.
The role is described as helping 'companies improve their AI models' and partnering with organizations to train AI models, indicating an understanding of how AI models serve business objectives.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
